importantArticles.headline: VALE S.A. (NYSE:VALE) shares are trading lower on Friday. On Thursday, the company reported a decline in first-quarter net operating revenue of 4% year over year (Y/Y) to $8.119 billion, beating the consensus of $8.03 billion. Sales from Iron ore rose 4% year over year, copper grew 7% year over year, and nickel surged 18% year over year.
